title: Acupuncture is a gentle and efficient way of re-establishing the body’s natural balance
text:
-
[PREGNANCY](http://taniaspearman.com/pregnancy/)
Acupuncture helps you during pregnancy and prepares your body for childbirth
-
[IVF & FERTILITY](http://taniaspearman.com/ivf-fertility/)
Treatments can be of benefit in assisted or natural conception for patients of all ages
-
[STRESS & DEPRESSION](http://taniaspearman.com/stress-depression/)
Acupuncture can restore or improve your emotional welfare
-
[ACHES & PAIN](http://taniaspearman.com/aches-pain/)
Don’t put up with pain anymore. Acupuncture can relieve your discomfort
What patients say about treatment with me
Tania is a very compassionate, understanding and professional acupuncturist. She has a kind, lively and warm personality that shines through. The warm ambience of her clinic provides a nurturing space where one feels at home, such that each visit to Tania feels like a return to home, a return to nurturing oneself.”
Tania changed my life. Since I was a little girl I had always suffered from anxiety and fear. I had tried everything from therapy to meditation, and nothing seemed to be the right fit for me. Within just a few sessions I noticed the inability for my body to even produce fear. I never thought I would live without fear…but now I don’t have to.”
-
